verses.verse: And Jehoshaphat<WH3092> the king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> returned<WH7725> to his house<WH1004> in peace<WH7965> to Jerusalem<WH3389>.

And whensoever any controversy shall come<WH935> to you from your brethren<WH251> that dwell<WH3427> in their cities<WH5892>, between blood<WH1818> and blood<WH1818>, between law<WH8451> and commandment<WH4687>, statutes<WH2706> and ordinances<WH4941>, ye shall warn<WH2094> them<WH816>, that they be not guilty towards Jehovah<WH3068>, and so wrath<WH7110> come upon you and upon your brethren<WH251>: this<WH3541> do<WH6213>, and ye shall not be guilty<WH816>.
